summaryOfNewsArticle: Recent technological advancements, particularly in artificial intelligence and social media, have significantly influenced how people interact socially. The article from May 10, 2023, explores how AI-powered communication tools have improved response times and personalization in online interactions. At the same time, social media usage has evolved into more private and niche communities, reducing the frequency of broad public engagement. As a result, there is a rising focus on digital well-being, with individuals seeking to maintain a healthy balance between online and offline activities to preserve mental health and real-world relationships.
title: How Artificial Intelligence and Social Media Are Reshaping Social Interactions
